subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: LaShawn Merritt blazed across the line first and, looking strongest Thursday night at the United States Olympic track and field trials, left Jeremy Wariner and the rest of the field in his wake.
snippet: LaShawn Merritt blazed across the line first and, looking strongest Thursday night at the United States Olympic track and field trials, left Jeremy Wariner and the rest of the field in his wake.
